creator: Vincent Routhier
descriptionHtml:
EVOFIT's purpose is to help its community to fulfill their fitness objectives with the use of the technologies. Our target audience is everyone from beginner to experienced athletes who want to enjoy and/or improve at their sport!

Track your activities
Each time you do a fitness activity while using our app, this one will track and save several information about your trip such as the GPS coordinates, distance, time, speed, calories, elevation gain/loss, heart rate, weather, cadence and pictures.

Train for an event
Create highly customizable training that you can follow with the help of audio cues while you are doing your activity.
The audio cues will help you keep an objective pace or heart rate for a respective time or distance.
For example, you can create a heart rate intervals training with a warm-up period.

Analyze your evolution
Analyze your evolution by looking at the statistics of all the activities that you have tracked.
You can filter and sort by a large number of parameters and look at them in the table or the chart format. You can also revisit the activities of your personal bests in a multiple of categories.

Share with your friends
Share, comment and like your adventure with your friends and families with the activities feed.

Support multiple individual sports
We support a multitudes of activity types from running and cycling to swimming, hiking, skating, skiing, climbing and more!

Other key features
• Heart Rate monitor - Pair your Bluetooth heart rate monitor with the app to unlock HR training and keep your HR data. (We currently only support the Polar brand devices).
• Routes - Create routes in the app and use them for a more consistent experience by preventing GPS coordinates error bias. This can also help you plan your distances in advance. Furthermore, you can use routes as a filter in statistics.
• Audio Cues - Add audio cues to your activities to know about your live performance without the need to look at your phone.
• Shoes mileage tracking - Keep track of your shoes mileage to prevent an overuse and know when to change your pair.
• Location Sharing - Share your location along with other information with who you want to let know them where you are in real time.
• Mass History - Keep track of the changes in your mass over time.
• And More! - Customize your experience with a lot of other features such as the warm-up and cool down timers, the auto pause and the leaderboard.

Planned features
•  Plan your training in a calendar.
•  Compete against yourself in a ghost run.
•  Create groups in a location to meet people and socialize while enjoying the same sport.
•  And more to come…

Why EVOFIT
Compared to most of the other fitness trackers, you can access all our features for free.
We fund our development and maintenance cost by using a small amount of non-interruptive ads.
If you don't want to see these ads, you can also subscribe monthly for a small price.
Moreover, one of the EVOFIT objectives is to develop innovative features and ideas that other fitness trackers may not have.

EVOFIT is in early development
While using the app, please keep in mind that the application is still in alpha and may have some small bugs. We will try to fix all the bugs as soon as possible.
If you encounter a problem, please contact us first before leaving a bad review. We will answer all your questions.
You can also give us new features ideas and we will develop the most popular ones first.
descriptionShort: Train, analyze, plan and evolve your fitness.

appDetails.developerAddress: 454 rue Principale Ouest, Magog, Quebec, Canada
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Welcome to the first EVOFIT production release! The application is still in development and may undergo a lot of changes but stay assured, I will make sure to keep your data compatible with the newer versions. If you would like to contribute to the development by giving ideas don't hesitate to email me at contact@evofit.org. Also stay tunes for updates!

You can filter and sort by a large number of parameters and look at them in the table or the chart format. You can also revisit the activities of your personal bests in a multiple of categories.

Share with your friends
Share, comment and like your adventure with your friends and families with the activities feed.

Support multiple individual sports
We support a multitudes of activity types from running and cycling to swimming, hiking, skating, skiing, climbing and more!

Other key features
• Heart Rate monitor - Pair your Bluetooth heart rate monitor with the app to unlock HR training and keep your HR data. (We currently only support the Polar brand devices).
• Routes - Create routes in the app and use them for a more consistent experience by preventing GPS coordinates error bias. This can also help you plan your distances in advance. Furthermore, you can use routes as a filter in statistics.
• Audio Cues - Add audio cues to your activities to know about your live performance without the need to look at your phone.
• Shoes mileage tracking - Keep track of your shoes mileage to prevent an overuse and know when to change your pair.
• Location Sharing - Share your location along with other information with who you want to let know them where you are in real time.
• Mass History - Keep track of the changes in your mass over time.
• And More! - Customize your experience with a lot of other features such as the warm-up and cool down timers, the auto pause and the leaderboard.

Planned features
•  Plan your training in a calendar.
•  Compete against yourself in a ghost run.
•  Create groups in a location to meet people and socialize while enjoying the same sport.
•  And more to come…

Why EVOFIT
Compared to most of the other fitness trackers, you can access all our features for free.
We fund our development and maintenance cost by using a small amount of non-interruptive ads.
If you don't want to see these ads, you can also subscribe monthly for a small price.
Moreover, one of the EVOFIT objectives is to develop innovative features and ideas that other fitness trackers may not have.

EVOFIT is in early development
While using the app, please keep in mind that the application is still in alpha and may have some small bugs. We will try to fix all the bugs as soon as possible.
If you encounter a problem, please contact us first before leaving a bad review. We will answer all your questions.
You can also give us new features ideas and we will develop the most popular ones first.

• Audio Cues - Add audio cues to your activities to know about your live performance without the need to look at your phone.
• Shoes mileage tracking - Keep track of your shoes mileage to prevent an overuse and know when to change your pair.
• Location Sharing - Share your location along with other information with who you want to let know them where you are in real time.
• Mass History - Keep track of the changes in your mass over time.
• And More! - Customize your experience with a lot of other features such as the warm-up and cool down timers, the auto pause and the leaderboard.

Planned features
•  Plan your training in a calendar.
•  Compete against yourself in a ghost run.
•  Create groups in a location to meet people and socialize while enjoying the same sport.
•  And more to come…

Why EVOFIT
Compared to most of the other fitness trackers, you can access all our features for free.
We fund our development and maintenance cost by using a small amount of non-interruptive ads.
If you don't want to see these ads, you can also subscribe monthly for a small price.
Moreover, one of the EVOFIT objectives is to develop innovative features and ideas that other fitness trackers may not have.

EVOFIT is in early development
While using the app, please keep in mind that the application is still in alpha and may have some small bugs. We will try to fix all the bugs as soon as possible.
If you encounter a problem, please contact us first before leaving a bad review. We will answer all your questions.
You can also give us new features ideas and we will develop the most popular ones first.
descriptionShort: Train, analyze, plan and evolve your fitness.

appDetails.developerAddress: 454 rue Principale Ouest, Magog, Quebec, Canada
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Welcome to the first EVOFIT production release! The application is still in development and may undergo a lot of changes but stay assured, I will make sure to keep your data compatible with the newer versions. If you would like to contribute to the development by giving ideas don't hesitate to email me at contact@evofit.org. Also stay tunes for updates!

title: EVOFIT - Running, walking & cycling tracker

container.value: 454 rue Principale Ouest, Magog, Quebec, Canada

creator: Vincent Routhier
descriptionHtml:
EVOFIT's purpose is to help its community to fulfill their fitness objectives with the use of the technologies. Our target audience is everyone from beginner to experienced athletes who want to enjoy and/or improve at their sport!

Track your activities
Each time you do a fitness activity while using our app, this one will track and save several information about your trip such as the GPS coordinates, distance, time, speed, calories, elevation gain/loss, heart rate, weather, cadence and pictures.

Train for an event
Create highly customizable training that you can follow with the help of audio cues while you are doing your activity.
The audio cues will help you keep an objective pace or heart rate for a respective time or distance.
For example, you can create a heart rate intervals training with a warm-up period.

Analyze your evolution
Analyze your evolution by looking at the statistics of all the activities that you have tracked.
You can filter and sort by a large number of parameters and look at them in the table or the chart format. You can also revisit the activities of your personal bests in a multiple of categories.

Share with your friends
Share, comment and like your adventure with your friends and families with the activities feed.

Support multiple individual sports
We support a multitudes of activity types from running and cycling to swimming, hiking, skating, skiing, climbing and more!

Other key features
• Heart Rate monitor - Pair your Bluetooth heart rate monitor with the app to unlock HR training and keep your HR data. (We currently only support the Polar brand devices).
• Routes - Create routes in the app and use them for a more consistent experience by preventing GPS coordinates error bias. This can also help you plan your distances in advance. Furthermore, you can use routes as a filter in statistics.
• Audio Cues - Add audio cues to your activities to know about your live performance without the need to look at your phone.
• Shoes mileage tracking - Keep track of your shoes mileage to prevent an overuse and know when to change your pair.
• Location Sharing - Share your location along with other information with who you want to let know them where you are in real time.
• Mass History - Keep track of the changes in your mass over time.
• And More! - Customize your experience with a lot of other features such as the warm-up and cool down timers, the auto pause and the leaderboard.

Planned features
•  Plan your training in a calendar.
•  Compete against yourself in a ghost run.
•  Create groups in a location to meet people and socialize while enjoying the same sport.
•  And more to come…

Why EVOFIT
Compared to most of the other fitness trackers, you can access all our features for free.
We fund our development and maintenance cost by using a small amount of non-interruptive ads.
If you don't want to see these ads, you can also subscribe monthly for a small price.
Moreover, one of the EVOFIT objectives is to develop innovative features and ideas that other fitness trackers may not have.

EVOFIT is in early development
While using the app, please keep in mind that the application is still in alpha and may have some small bugs. We will try to fix all the bugs as soon as possible.
If you encounter a problem, please contact us first before leaving a bad review. We will answer all your questions.
You can also give us new features ideas and we will develop the most popular ones first.
